B9B.F.summary: BHB Brauholding Bayern-Mitte AG engages in the brewery business in Germany. It offers wheat beer, bottom-fermented beerspecialties, and beer mixed drinks, as well as mineral water and non-alcoholic soft drinks, and thirst quenchers. The company was founded in 1882 and is based in Ingolstadt, Germany.

KUL.MU.summary: Kulmbacher Brauerei Aktien-Gesellschaft operates breweries in Germany. It provides beers and non-alcoholic drinks. The company was founded in 1846 and is based in Kulmbach, Germany.

LBH1.MU.summary: Landshuter Brauhaus AG produces and sells beer, soft drinks, and Spezi. The company was founded in 1493 and is based in Landshut, Germany.

PKB.F.summary: Park & Bellheimer AG manufactures and sells beverages primarily in Germany. It offers beers, soft drinks, and mineral water under the Park, Bellheimer, Valentins Weissbier, RheingÃ¶nheimer, and Bellaris brand names. The company was formerly known as Parkbrauerei AG Pirmasens-ZweibrÃ¼cken and changed its name to Park & Bellheimer AG in 1995. Park & Bellheimer AG was incorporated in 1888 and is headquartered in Pirmasens, Germany.
